heroSubtitle: Empowering young women to reach for the stars and beyond
introText: AIC Sengani Girls High School is dedicated to providing quality education that nurtures the intellectual, physical, social, and spiritual development of young women. Located in Tala town, Matungulu Sub-County, our school has grown from humble beginnings to become one of the respected educational institutions in Machakos County.

featureCards.title: Academic Excellence
featureCards.description: Our comprehensive curriculum follows the Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education (KCSE) standards, preparing students for higher education and future careers.

featureCards.title: Holistic Development
featureCards.description: We believe in nurturing the whole person through sports, clubs, leadership opportunities, and spiritual guidance.

featureCards.title: Quality Facilities
featureCards.description: Our campus provides modern classrooms, laboratories, library resources, and comfortable boarding facilities.

featureCards.title: Strong Values
featureCards.description: We instill discipline, integrity, responsibility, and respect in our students, preparing them to be responsible citizens.

testimonials.quote: Being at Sengani Girls has transformed me into a confident and ambitious young woman. The supportive environment and dedicated teachers have helped me discover my potential in both academics and leadership.
testimonials.name: Faith Mwangi

testimonials.quote: The diverse extracurricular activities at Sengani have allowed me to explore my interests beyond the classroom. Through the debate club, I've developed public speaking skills that I never thought I could have.
testimonials.name: Grace Ochieng
